com.usamd.controller

Class AbstractController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.usamd.controller.AbstractController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoggerInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddressController, DoctorController, HomeSectionController, LoginController, MedicineController, SymptomsController, WebUserController

    public abstract class AbstractController
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoggerInterface
    This class will acts as Parent class for all the Controller classes and provide interface for logging and reading data from properties files.
    Author:
    USAWebMD
